Package org.bytemechanics.metrics.crawler.sensors.stack

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractManualStackSensor<TYPE extends Number>
    Manual abstract base class for sensors extends AbstractStackSensor adding capacity to register a measure manually, additionally to the capacity of stack metric names.
    AbstractStackSensor<TYPE>
    Manual abstract base class for sensors extends AbstractStackSensor adding capacity to stack metric names automatically This means that the final sensor name will be the accumulation of the previous open sensors in the same thread separated by dot (.)
    DoubleStackSensor
    Double stack sensor (must be informed manually)
    Usage: try(DoubleSensor sensor=DoubleSensor.get("myMeasure{}",1)){ (...)
    DurationStackSensor
    Duration sensor measures time between sensor creation and close()
    Usage: try(DurationSensor sensor=DurationSensor.get("myMeasure{}",1)){ (...)
    LongStackSensor
    Long stack sensor (must be informed manually)
    Usage: try(LongSensor sensor=LongSensor.get("myMeasure{}",1)){ (...)
